Approximately 150 participant genotype 1 HCV infection , previously receive treatment HCV , diagnosis cirrhosis enrol . Participants randomize 1 2 group . Group 1 : SOF/LDV FDC tablet plus placebo match RBV 24 week Group 2 : Delayed treatment group : placebo match SOF/LDV FDC plus placebo match RBV 12 week , follow SOF/LDV FDC daily plus RBV divide daily dose 12 week Randomization 1:1 two group stratify HCV genotype ( 1a , 1b ; mixed genotype 1 result stratify genotype 1a ) , prior HCV therapy treatment response ( never achieve HCV RNA < low limit quantitation ( LLOQ ) , achieve HCV RNA < LLOQ ) .
